title: Ants in the irrigation drippers
creator_credit: Jeanette Holloway, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In 1976, Jeanette and Arthur Holloway took over Arthur’s family farm in Chiltern, Victoria. There they began a partnership with two other families to grow kiwi fruit. Jeanette Holloway recounts the time there, the hardships and how the farm became her home.
